column4: Tourism;Sihanoukville: Citizens say two Chinese men
column5: one sitting in the car park of a Total gas station near Phsar Leu market and the other in the middle of a road in front of the Queenco (?) casino
column6: were acting in a very strange way
column7: and it is believed they were both under the influence of drugs and/or  breakdown.------The photos were taken on the afternoon of July 9
column8: 2020. It is not clear whether authorities have yet intervened. ------KPSFACEBOOK
